alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 5:17PM CDT until August 06 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Sangamon County in central Illinois... Northeastern Morgan County in west central Illinois... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 517 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Alexander, or 9 miles east of Jacksonville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alexander, New Berlin and Berlin. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 73 and 89. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and west central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and west central Illinois.
